purpose.p: ISO 10303 is an International Standard for the computer-interpretable representation of product information and for the exchange of product data. The objective is to provide a neutral mechanism capable of describing products throughout their life cycle. This mechanism is suitable not only for neutral file exchange, but also as a basis for implementing and sharing product databases, and as a basis for archiving.
This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the data that identifies a product group, which collects products that share a common activity.

inscope.li: Any group of products that share a common need, such as analysis, production, usage, support activity, support solution
Any product view within the product life cycle
No implication with respect to common part type, number, owner, assembly is made
Nested product groups, specifying a group as a subset of another group
Reference to the stakeholder to the group, which triggers the group
List of common characteristics which is shared by the members of the group, for instance scheduled for maintenance
